events.message: We have successfully received the candidate’s application for the software engineer position. The resume shows relevant experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on key terms found such as software, developer, and cloud. The profile fits our backend developer requirements.
Recruiter Jane Doe has been assigned the candidate to move forward with initial screening and scheduling technical interviews.
The initial screening call was completed successfully. The candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software architecture and relevant technologies.
Candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the technical interview and confirming availability for the proposed dates.
A technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-05 at 14:00 UTC, focusing on software design patterns and coding skills.
The technical interview was completed successfully; the candidate exhibited excellent proficiency with coding challenges and system design discussions.
The HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-07 to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate expectations.
The HR interview was completed with positive feedback regarding the candidate’s mindset and alignment with company values.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits, reflecting the candidate’s skills and experience.
The candidate has provided feedback expressing excitement and appreciation for the offer, requesting some clarifications on stock options.
The candidate formally accepted the offer. We are moving forward with onboarding preparations to integrate the new software engineer into the team.
Onboarding has started with the candidate joining orientation sessions and initial meetings with the engineering leads.
The hiring process is now officially closed as the new software engineer has successfully completed onboarding and joined the project team.
